If a server path/name.ext or a complete URL is specified, this overrides any existing files that have been selected.
Gift certificates must have a minimum value of %1$s, and a maximum of %2$s. Please note that it is only possible to purchase a gift certificate in the stores main currency.
Important: This tool has <u>not</u> been designed to manage existing inventory. Please use it to import new products only.
(Total stock of all product option combinations)

This product is currently out of stock
This product hasn't been reviewed yet.
You can save money on this item when you purchase several at a time. The table below shows the minimum quantities required to benefit from this offer, and how much they'll cost.
Customers who bought this also bought…

To use a coupon as a gift certificate (keeping a balance for multiple uses) it is possible to do so by assigning an order number to it. It must be a real order number with a status of "Processing" or "Complete".
Gift certificates can't have a percentage discount type.

Exporting the store catalogue may be broken down into several downloads for larger inventories. Please click the number to download each part. If there is an error exporting please try a lower value using the drop down menu.

So long as a data feed access password is set in your stores settings (under the "Other" section of the Advanced Tab) you can automate your feeds by pasting the feed URL into your providers control panel.

group.name: checkout
group.string: Unfortunately there are no suitable shipping methods available for your order. This may be because the total weight of your order is too high or we cannot ship to your country. Please contact a member of our staff for any further inquiries.
New shipping options are available! Please check and continue.
Sorry, you can't buy more than we have. We have automatically reduced your quantity to the maximum available.
Sorry, that voucher does not exist.
Sorry, your basket does not qualify for that coupon.
Sorry, but %s is no longer available and has been removed from your basket.
Sorry, that voucher is not valid for the items in your basket.
A total of %s is due for order number %s

group.name: common
group.string: WARNING: This store is closed. Only staff members logged in can view the store whilst it is offline. To view the offline message please log out.
All translations have been done already. Please choose one to edit if you need to make changes.
Are you sure you want to remove this?
Please enter a valid email address.
Please read the help documentation before using this!
Thank you for shopping with us!

group.name: confirm
group.string: Many thanks for your order! The order status is currently pending but it will automatically update to processing once payment is confirmed. Normally this is automated and will happen within the hour but please do contact us if you require more information.
Many thanks for your order! Payment has been received and your order is now being processed.
Many thanks for your order! Payment has been received and your order is now complete.
Unfortunately payment was unsuccessful. You can use the link below to attempt a new purchase or please contact a member of staff for further assistance.
Your order has been cancelled. Please contact a member of staff if you require further assistance. Alternatively we hope to see you again in the future.

group.name: contact
group.string: It is possible to specify specific departments and email addresses below. On completion a drop down menu will be presented to the customer so that the message can be directed to the appropriate department.
It is possible to add extra information to the contact section of the store such as phone numbers and postal addresses using the rich text editor below.

%s <%s> wrote to %s: --------------- %s ---------------
This email is sent from the stores master email address but it is possible to reply directly to the sender using the reply button on your email software.
Form submissions should be sent to

group.name: customer
group.string: Failed to add customer. Please make sure first name, last name and email address are not empty and that the email address is not already in use.
Customer can not be deleted, as they have placed orders.
That customer could not be found.

group.name: dashboard
group.string: Welcome to your store. Please follow this quick tour to help get you started.
Define some basic information here such as your store name & address, main currency and upload a logo.
Create the category structure for your product inventory. There are no limits to how many you can have or how many levels your subcategories can go.
Add a few digital or physical products whilst assigning them to one or more categories.
Select a free shipping rate calculator and payment integration from the CubeCart Marketplace. There are a huge amount to choose from including FedEx, PayPal etc…
Configure your chosen shipping rate calculator and payment integration from the plugins area.
Update your homepage with any content you want. Here you can manage a "hero carousel" and add any HTML content you wish.

We have only touched the tip of the iceberg but it's enough to get you selling today. Please fine a video tour below which goes into a little more detail.

Have fun and best of luck with your store!
WARNING: Your store appears to be using source code from %s but the database is still at %s.Please complete the upgrade by running the setup process.
WARNING: Your includes/global.inc.php is currently writable, you should change the file permissions to read only. On Linux or Unix systems it should be CHMOD to 0444.
WARNING: You are currently connected to the database using the root account. This is not secure, and should be changed.
WARNING: Caching is disabled. Please enable it in the advanced tab of your stores settings.
WARNING: Please delete the setup folder from your store directory, your store may be at risk until you do.
WARNING: Your store is not up-to-date, v%1$s is available, but you are running v%2$s

group.name: email
group.string: Your store currently only has one master language. Before the email contents can be translated the master language file must be installed from our extensions marketplace.
Are you sure you want to cancel the sending of this newsletter?
Are you sure you want to send this newsletter?
If left empty stores default taken.
It is not possible to delete the only translation of an email content.
Plain text version was empty. We have automatically created a version based on the HTML version.
The HTML version was empty. Please create some content and try again.
{$EMAIL_CONTENT} macro not detected in template contents.
There are no mailing list subscribers.
Subscribers who have their email client set to prefer rich text HTML emails will see the contents of this field.
Subscribers who have their email client set to prefer plain text emails will see the contents of this field. Please do not enter HTML here.
Export your email customizations to file. The file will be saved in the languages directory as 'email_<language code>-custom.xml'.

You can reinstall your email templates here, by selecting the language in the dropdown, then clicking 'save'.
Warning: This will replace ALL email contents for the specified language with their defaults
Note: Visitors only need to add their email address to subscribe to the mailing list. Some data will only be known if they are a registered customer.

Please use this to send a test copy of the email before sending it out to your customers. The email received will be sent in multipart format.
To view the HTML or text version you may need to edit your mail client settings.
Your customers will either see rich HTML or plain text depending on their email client settings.

IMPORTANT: Macros must be retained in the email content for it to be populated with suitable data. Dynamic regions or repeat regions must also be retained (e.g. {foreach from=$products item=item}Dynamic data or repeat data{/foreach}).
The time when the download link will expire.
The link to download the product.
The link to manage the order.

Failed to download latest version. Please attempt manual upgrade.

Choose if you want to include the structure and/or data and click backup to create an export of your database. Please note that it is only possible to restore the database if every option is selected aside from compression.
Click backup to build a compressed archive of your entire store.

Are you sure you want to restore these files?

Please be sure to create a working backup of both your store database and files before upgrading to the latest version. Once this has been done please click the link below to upgrade to the latest version.
Your store is currently using the latest version. Please click force upgrade to restore to the default code for this version.
It is not possible to restore that file.
The current version has been restored.
If you select 'Include Drop Table' then you must also check 'Include Structure'

Separate MySQL queries with delimiter ; #EOQ at the end of each line.

Installing anything from the CubeCart Marketplace is a breeze using install tokens. Locate the item you want and click the thunderbolt icon () next to the file name. This will generate your install token which can be used here to install/upgrade and downgrade.
The following read only settings needs to be set within the 3rd parties control panel interface.
* It is possible to either enter text such as "Credit Card" or enter a file path to an image.
e.g. Next Day Delivery, Free Shipping etc…

group.name: order_state
group.string: Order has been created and staff members are awaiting payment before any further action will be taken. This order may be automatically cancelled if payment has not been made by a specific time scale.
Payment may or may have not cleared or the order hasn't been dealt with yet.
Order has been paid for and dispatched. Goods should arrive shortly. Tracking information may be available.
Order has been declined. More information may be available in the order notes.
Payment for the order has failed external/internal fraud review.

Order has been cancelled. Reasons for order cancellation should show in your order notes. Please note that new orders which have not been paid for within a certain time scale may automatically be cancelled.

group.string: Sorry but order %s was not found.

As you are upgrading from version %s, you can enter a Software Licence Key to use CubeCart Pro.
The page may reload several times, but this is perfectly normal. We'll let you know when it's done, so go grab a cup of coffee.
This is the database hostname e.g. localhost

The password required by the username.
The database name for the store tables to be served from.
If you are hosting more then one store on one dtabase please define a table prefix to prevent clashing table names.

Please choose your stores default currency.

group.name: translate
group.string: No languages have been found. Please visit the marketplace to get hold of the ones you want.
Account - Phrases within the customers account area
Address - Phrases connected with postal or invoice addresses, and addressbook
Administor - Phrases within the administrators section of the control panel
Basket - Phrases displayed in the basket pages
Catalogue - Phrases displayed within the product inventory pages
Category - Phrases connected with the product categories
Checkout - Phrases displayed during the checkout process
Common - Phrases used in multiple places
Contact - Phrases used on the Contact Us page
Dashboard - Phrases used within the administrators dashboard
Documents - Phrases show in the administrators document management section
Email - Phrases used in email templates management
Filemanager - Phrases displayed in the administration area filemanager
Form - Phrases commonly used on forms
Gateway - Phrases displayed on payment pages
Global Error - Phrases concerning global errors or warnings
Hooks - Phrases found within code hook management
Maintain - Phrases displayed in the maintenance section of the administrators control panel
Module - Phrases displayed in the administration modules section. e.g. Gateways, Shipping etc…
Navigation - Phrases displayed in navigational elements
Newsletter - Phrases used in newsletter management
Notification - Phrases used to notify customers or staff members
Orders - Phrases releated to store orders
Recaptcha - Phrases shown within the Recaptcha captcha system
Reports - Phrases used within the administrational reporting tools
Reviews - Phrases displayed on the review management page
Search - Phrases displayed to the customer on product search
Setup - Phrases displayed during the install/upgrade process
Statistics - Phrases shown on the administrational statistics pages
User Interface - Phrases specific to the user interface
